{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Amped Wireless |model=RTA1300M |revision=(Artemis) |upc= |ean= |asin=B01GE9RC6K |price=129.99 |est_release_date=05/31/2016 |fcc_date=05/03/2016 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=new |type=wireless router |fcc_id=ZTT-RTA1300M |ic_id=10233A-RTA1300M |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=638 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=SPI |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY2623L;SKY, 2623L, 526CX;2; ,,, 2.4GHz SPDT Switch with Low-Noise Amplifier;Skyworks;SKY85201-11;SKY1, 5201, 520B;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85728-11;SKY85728-11, UM5KR, 1514, MY;2; |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware=LEDE Project |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=Amped_Artemis_2.4, Amped_Artemis_5.0 |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.3.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=F8:7B:8C |oui_eth=F8:7B:8C }}
:• '''867Mbps''' - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400Mbps''' - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|ARTEMIS High Power AC1300 Wi-Fi Router with MU-MIMO}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.ampedwireless.com/mobile/products/rta1300m.html}} "1244-01001083-50Z_ES" is silkscreened on the board. {{see also|Edimax|}} FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/ZTT-RTA1300M ZTT-RTA1300M] (2016-05-03) :Default settings are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2977320 FCC label]. [[Amped Wireless RTA1300M]] ===Overview=== *'''High Power Quad-Core Processor''': :A quad-core processor handles heavy traffic with ease, for the best Wi-Fi experience *'''Ultra-Fast AC1300 Speeds''': :Get more done with AC1300 Wi-Fi speeds up to 400Mbps 2.4GHz + 866Mbps 5GHz *'''Multi-User MIMO''': :Deliver data to multiple devices at once for a boost in performance and speed *'''8 Powerful Amplifiers & 2 Antennas''': :Amplify Wi-Fi to the max with advanced amplifiers and external antennas *'''Extreme Wi-Fi Range''': :High Power Wi-Fi for whole home or whole office coverage *'''Advanced Security Features''': :Adjust the coverage of your network, block websites and utilize SPI Firewall *'''Guest Networks & User Access''': :Create up to 8 networks for guests and restrict access to specific users *'''Ultimate Gaming, HD & 4K''': :Seamlessly stream HD and 4K content to multiple devices and eliminate gaming lag *'''Bandwidth Optimization''': :Prioritize bandwidth for specific applications, networks and devices on your network *'''Share Files with USB''': :Attach a USB drive and instantly share files at blazing-fast speeds, locally or remotely ===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC1300'' (400Mbps [2.4 GHz] + 867Mbps [5 GHz]) * Processor: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ4018 Quad-Core ARM Processor * Memory: 128MB DDR3 * Amplifiers: 4x Low Noise Amplifiers, :2x 2.4GHz Power Amplifiers, 2x 5GHz Power Amplifiers * Antennas: 2x Detachable Dual Band High Gain 5dBi * Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN, 1x ''USB 3.0'' * Power Supply: AC Input: 110~240V (50~60Hz) : DC Output: 12V with max. 2A current ===Reviews=== *[http://www.tweaktown.com/reviews/7812/amped-wireless-artemis-ac1300-rta1300m-router-review/index.html ''Amped Wireless Artemis RTA1300M Wireless Router'' on '''TweakTown'''] *[http://techaeris.com/2016/06/28/amped-wireless-artemis-high-power-ac1300-wi-fi-router-review/ ''ARTEMIS High Power AC1300 Wi-Fi Router'' on '''TechAeris'''] ===Forum threads=== *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/amped-wireless-shipping-2x2-mu-mimo-router.32734/ ''Amped Wireless Shipping 2x2 MU-MIMO Router'' on '''SNBforums'''] *[http://www.snbforums.com/threads/qualcomm-rolls-out-its-tri-radio-ac-platform.32865 ''Qualcomm Rolls Out Its Tri-radio AC Platform'' on '''SNBforums'''] *[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX ''LEDE/Openwrt for IPQ4019/IPQ4028 devices'' on '''chunkeey'''] ===See also=== *[[Amped Wireless RTA15]] - ''High Power AC1200 Dual Band Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RTA1300M]] - ''ARTEMIS High Power AC1300 Dual Band Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RE1300M]] - ''ARTEMIS-EX High Power AC1300 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' *[[Amped Wireless RTA1900]] - ''TITAN High Power AC1900 Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RE1900A]] - ''TITAN-EX High Power AC1900 Wi-Fi Range Extender *[[Amped Wireless RTA2600]] - ''ATHENA High Power AC2600 Wi-Fi Router'' *[[Amped Wireless RE2600M]] - ''ATHENA-EX High Power AC2600 Wi-Fi Range Extender'' __NOTOC__
